## Natural history notes

Roundpod St. John's-Wort (Hypericum cistifolium) is a perennial shrub that grows up to 1m tall in pine savannas and flatwoods in Florida. Preferrsing sandy soils, you can find this plant on the margins of emergent wetlands embedded within pine flatwoods habitat, as it can tolerate inundated soils. Look out for the five-petal, bright yellow flowers in early spring through summer with simple, opposite leaves.
